reviewText:
Bought this item for Haloween, but the kids found it a little boring.
The Story teller did not grasp the kids attention.
Would I buy it again , I have to say no.
This was great for the kids...no blood and guts, just thrills and boos!  I hung onto it thru 2 kids...and I recommend this to anyone with a little monster that loves thrills and chills! *grin*
